医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学出版平台庆祝其网站页面浏览量突破十亿总部位于曼彻斯特的科学营销和出版平台 AZoNetwork 正在庆祝其科学网站网络的页面浏览量突破 10 亿次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Science-publishing-platform-celebrates-one-billion-page-views-across-its-websites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Science-publishing-platform-celebrates-one-billion-page-views-across-its-websites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bbcc8a7-9721-49c1-a534-1ee114ede312 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:57:00 -0500 Science publishing platform celebrates one billion page views across its websites
研究表明癌症是均匀生长的肿块科隆大学和巴塞罗那基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员发现，癌症在整个肿块中均匀生长，而不是在外边缘。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-shows-cancers-are-uniformly-having-masses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-shows-cancers-are-uniformly-having-masses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57814725-d349-44f5-8883-72176f196775 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:55:56 -0500 Study shows cancers are uniformly growing masses
研究表明脑震荡对非周期性大脑活动的影响一项针对高中橄榄球运动员的新研究发现，脑震荡会影响一个经常被忽视但很重要的大脑信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-shows-impact-of-concussions-on-aperiodic-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-shows-impact-of-concussions-on-aperiodic-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=305a0438-bc00-436b-a1f0-41cc5f31ddaa Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:47:00 -0500 Research shows impact of concussions on aperiodic brain activity
俄克拉荷马大学教授因胰腺癌研究荣获著名的帕拉德奖俄克拉荷马大学医学院 George Lynn Cross 医学、外科和细胞生物学教授、俄克拉荷马大学健康史蒂芬森癌症中心全球肿瘤学副主任李敏博士将获得国际奥委会颁发的 2024 年 Palade 奖胰腺病学协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/University-of-Oklahoma-professor-honored-with-prestigious-Palade-Prize-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/University-of-Oklahoma-professor-honored-with-prestigious-Palade-Prize-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f203908-f030-4a45-a30e-53dd88048871 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:19:29 -0500 University of Oklahoma professor honored with prestigious Palade Prize for pancreatic cancer research
印第安纳州医院因垄断担忧而撤回合并申请印第安纳州特雷霍特的两家竞争对手医院周一撤回了合并申请，就在该州因此类医疗垄断遭到越来越强烈的反对而对该交易做出裁决的几天前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Indiana-hospitals-pull-merger-application-after-pushback-over-monopoly-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Indiana-hospitals-pull-merger-application-after-pushback-over-monopoly-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e2efcf4-6fd2-4716-a846-0216dd2415d9 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:03:56 -0500 Indiana hospitals pull merger application after pushback over monopoly concerns
移民拘留中心承包商就加州健康检查提起诉讼GEO 集团是美国最大的私人监狱承包商之一，上个月对加州官员提起联邦诉讼，要求推翻一项允许当地公共卫生官员检查移民拘留设施的州法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Immigration-detention-center-contractor-sues-over-California-health-inspections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Immigration-detention-center-contractor-sues-over-California-health-inspections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dc1f54e-a3d8-47a0-8727-c885285cfb96 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Immigration detention center contractor sues over California health inspections
佛罗里达州德勤运营的计算机系统切断了新妈妈享受医疗补助的资格5 月中旬，曼迪·洛克克斯 (Mandi Rokx) 生下了一个 3 个月大的婴儿，佛罗里达州一家机构发出一封警告信，警告他们两人都将被排除在医疗补助 (Medicaid) 之外，该计划是针对低收入或残疾人的健康保险计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Floridae28099s-Deloitte-run-computer-system-cut-off-new-moms-entitled-to-Medicaid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Floridae28099s-Deloitte-run-computer-system-cut-off-new-moms-entitled-to-Medicaid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6df9029c-a3ba-4de7-9cc8-39b292245c2e Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Florida’s Deloitte-run computer system cut off new moms entitled to Medicaid
Tagomics 宣布与安捷伦达成多组学分析联合营销协议Tagomics Ltd. 是一家领先的生物标志物发现和诊断公司，今天宣布已与基因组学领域领先的工具提供商安捷伦科技公司签订战略联合营销协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Tagomics-announces-a-multiomic-profiling-co-marketing-agreement-with-Agilent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Tagomics-announces-a-multiomic-profiling-co-marketing-agreement-with-Agilent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaa26d69-d2c9-4272-8af5-d41db7229483 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 03:12:00 -0500 Tagomics announces a multiomic profiling co-marketing agreement with Agilent
情绪调节在预测抑郁症患者自杀风险中的作用抑郁症患者会本能地试图抑制对负面记忆提醒的最初情绪反应，一般来说，他们对令人痛苦的情绪刺激的容忍度较低，并且可能会对日常生活中的压力做出反应，从而导致自杀念头的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/The-role-of-emotion-regulation-in-predicting-suicidal-risk-in-depressed-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/The-role-of-emotion-regulation-in-predicting-suicidal-risk-in-depressed-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e55ed22-1590-4cc6-8546-5a24e950691a Tue, 26 Nov 2024 02:01:06 -0500 The role of emotion regulation in predicting suicidal risk in depressed individuals
研究揭开了β细胞再生的秘密Heiko Lickert教授是慕尼黑亥姆霍兹慕尼黑大学糖尿病与再生研究所所长、慕尼黑工业大学（TUM）教授、德国糖尿病研究中心（DZD）成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-unlocks-the-secrets-of-beta-cell-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-unlocks-the-secrets-of-beta-cell-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd10d280-89ba-48ce-b8ac-747bea188e34 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 01:56:07 -0500 Study unlocks the secrets of beta cell regeneration
